snippet: Houston roads were flooded and thousands of residents lost power on Monday after powerful thunderstorms plowed through the area, with a possible tornado damaging and shutting down a nearby mall.
abstract: Heavy rain and powerful thunderstorms hit drought-stricken Houston, flooding roads and causing thousands of residents to lose power, with a possible tornado damaging and shutting down a local mall.
lead_paragraph: Houston roads were flooded and thousands of residents lost power on Monday after powerful thunderstorms plowed through the area, with a possible tornado damaging and shutting down a nearby mall.

headline.main: Texas: Much-Needed Downpour Has a Downside
headline.print_headline: Texas: Much-Needed Downpour Has a Downside
